## ContractDeployPayloadBuilder class

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Use [SmartContractTransactionsFactory](./sdk-core.smartcontracttransactionsfactory.md) instead.
> 
> A builder for [TransactionPayload](./sdk-core.transactionpayload.md) objects, to be used for Smart Contract deployment transactions.
> 

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ContractDeployPayloadBuilder 
```
